name: Application rejected: did not agree marriage broken down
body:
Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

Your ((partner)) did not agree that your ((isDivorce??marriage))((isDissolution??civil partnership)) has irretrievably broken down. You must both agree with this to do a joint application ((isDivorce??for divorce))((isDissolution??to end your civil partnership)).  

If you still want ((isDivorce??to divorce))((isDissolution??to end your civil partnership)), then you can create a new sole application: ((signin url))

This means your ((partner)) will be asked to respond to your application after it's submitted. 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership))
